tool.description:
A table for tool configurations.

Every tool that is used by the project can have its own sub-table for its configuration.

build.description: The file used to build extensions.

dependencies.description: This is a hash of package name (keys) and version constraints (values) that are required to run this package.

python.description: The Python versions the package is compatible with.

dev-dependencies.description: This is a hash of package name (keys) and version constraints (values) that this package requires for developing it (testing tools and such).

exclude.description: A list of files and folders to exclude.

include.description: A list of files and folders to include.

items.description: A tag/keyword that this package relates to.

packages.description: A list of packages to include in the final distribution.

items.description: Information about where the package resides.

format.description: The format(s) for which the package must be included.

from.description: Where the source directory of the package resides.

include.description: What to include in the package.

plugins.description: A hash of hashes representing plugins

readme.description: The path to the README file

scripts.description: A hash of scripts to be installed.

source.description: A set of additional repositories where packages can be found.

^.+$.description: The full url of the custom url.

version.description: Version of the package. It should follow semantic versioning, but it is not enforced.

build-backend.description: The build backend for the package.

requires.description: A list of strings representing [PEP 508](https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0508) dependencies required to execute the build system.

poetry-author-pattern.description: Pattern that matches `Name <email>` like 'King Arthur' or 'Miss Islington <miss-islington@python.org>'.

poetry-authors.description: List of authors that contributed to the package. This is typically the main maintainers, not the full list.

poetry-extra-script.description: A script that should be installed only if extras are activated.

extras.description: The required extras for this script.
The required extras for this dependency.

markers.description: The PEP 508 compliant environment markers for which the dependency should be installed.

optional.description: Whether the dependency is optional or not.

platform.description: The platform(s) for which the dependency should be installed.

python.description: The python versions for which the dependency should be installed.

allow-prereleases.description: Whether the dependency allows prereleases or not.

allows-prereleases.description: Whether the dependency allows prereleases or not.

extras.description: The required extras for this dependency.

git.description: The url of the git repository.

markers.description: The PEP 508 compliant environment markers for which the dependency should be installed.

optional.description: Whether the dependency is optional or not.

platform.description: The platform(s) for which the dependency should be installed.

python.description: The python versions for which the dependency should be installed.

allow-prereleases.description: Whether the dependency allows prereleases or not.

allows-prereleases.description: Whether the dependency allows prereleases or not.

extras.description: The required extras for this dependency.

markers.description: The PEP 508 compliant environment markers for which the dependency should be installed.

optional.description: Whether the dependency is optional or not.

platform.description: The platform(s) for which the dependency should be installed.

python.description: The python versions for which the dependency should be installed.

source.description: The exclusive source used to search for this dependency.

poetry-maintainers.description: List of maintainers, other than the original author(s), that upkeep the package.

develop.description: Whether to install the dependency in development mode.

extras.description: The required extras for this dependency.

markers.description: The PEP 508 compliant environment markers for which the dependency should be installed.

optional.description: Whether the dependency is optional or not.

platform.description: The platform(s) for which the dependency should be installed.

python.description: The python versions for which the dependency should be installed.

poetry-pep440-version.description: A version constraint. Validates against the PEP 440's version pattern.

default.description: Make this repository the default (disable PyPI)

secondary.description: Declare this repository as secondary, i.e. it will only be looked up last for packages.

poetry-script.description: A simple script pointing to a callable object.

extras.description: The required extras for this dependency.

markers.description: The PEP 508 compliant environment markers for which the dependency should be installed.

optional.description: Whether the dependency is optional or not.

platform.description: The platform(s) for which the dependency should be installed.

python.description: The python versions for which the dependency should be installed.
